data.text: Me Nyankopɔn, tie me, bere a mereka me haw;
Fa me sie fi amumɔyɛfo agyinatu ho,
Wofi ahintawee mu, tow bɔ onipa a ne ho nni asɛm;
Wɔhyehyɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho nkuran wɔ wɔn amumɔyɛ nhyehyɛe ho,
Wɔbɔ ntɛnkyew ho pɔw na wɔka se,
Nanso Onyankopɔn bɛto bɛmma abɔ wɔn;
Ɔbɛdan wɔn ankasa tɛkrɛma atia wɔn
Ma atreneefo nni ahurusi wɔ Awurade mu
